key.name: shortcut
key.description: The keyboard shortcut to toggle the do not disturb button state.

key.name: panel-icon-center
key.description: If true panel button icon position left center or right center.

key.name: panel-icon-left
key.description: Panel button icon position left, right, left center, or right center.

key.name: panel-count-show
key.description: If true, display the number of notifications.

key.name: busy-state
key.description: If true, busy state is set at enable.

key.name: override
key.summary: Override persistent busy state at session startup.
key.description: If true, determine state from overrride-busy-state.

key.name: overrride-busy-state
key.description: If true, state is set busy at startup.

key.name: reset-icon
key.summary: Effect change of panel button icon.
key.description: When toggled the extension is disabled and then enabled.
